channel.title: hollow core on Sandberg GPR
channel.description: Recent content in hollow core on Sandberg GPR

item.title: Construction and building defects in a London school
item.description: We used GPR to investigate construction detail and identify building defects, specifically if precast hollow core units had reinforcement within them and were filled with concrete.

item.title: Concrete inspection â€“ locating hazards and defects in concrete
item.description: GPR concrete inspection enables you to see into the sub-surface to determine construction detail, locate dangers, and identify defects in concrete.
